mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Jarbo, James A. to Pierpont, Francis Harrison
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Jarbo, James A.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gov Pierpoint [Francis H. Pierpont], Wheeling, Apl 12 1862. By Telegraph from Piedmont 12 . 1862. I have seen an order from War Department stopping all recruiting officers does this effect me- I have men here which I want subsistence for. Please answer. James A Jarbo 27W108Col
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Jarbo, James A.
Piedmont, (West) Virginia
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis Harrison
